body_html:
The numpy docs have a note saying "When using a non-integer step, such as 0.1, the results will often not be consistent."

https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy/reference/generated/numpy.arange.html

Maybe this could be added to the torch.arange doc as well?
body_text:
The numpy docs have a note saying "When using a non-integer step, such as 0.1, the results will often not be consistent."
https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy/reference/generated/numpy.arange.html
Maybe this could be added to the torch.arange doc as well?
body:
The numpy docs have a note saying "When using a non-integer step, such as 0.1, the results will often not be consistent."

https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy/reference/generated/numpy.arange.html

Maybe this could be added to the torch.arange doc as well?
